Browse the source code of MediaInfoLib/ThirdParty/aes-gladman/aes_modes.c

1/*
2---------------------------------------------------------------------------
3Copyright (c) 1998-2013, Brian Gladman, Worcester, UK. All rights reserved.
4
5The redistribution and use of this software (with or without changes)
6is allowed without the payment of fees or royalties provided that:
7
8 source code distributions include the above copyright notice, this
9 list of conditions and the following disclaimer;
10
11 binary distributions include the above copyright notice, this list
12 of conditions and the following disclaimer in their documentation.
13
14This software is provided 'as is' with no explicit or implied warranties
15in respect of its operation, including, but not limited to, correctness
16and fitness for purpose.
17---------------------------------------------------------------------------
18Issue Date: 20/12/2007
19
20 These subroutines implement multiple block AES modes for ECB, CBC, CFB,
21 OFB and CTR encryption, The code provides support for the VIA Advanced
22 Cryptography Engine (ACE).
23
24 NOTE: In the following subroutines, the AES contexts (ctx) must be
25 16 byte aligned if VIA ACE is being used
26*/
27
28#include <string.h>
29#include <assert.h>
30#include <stdint.h>
31
32#include "aesopt.h"
33
34#if defined( AES_MODES )
35#if defined(__cplusplus)
36extern "C"
37{
38#endif
39
40#if defined( _MSC_VER ) && ( _MSC_VER > 800 )
41#pragma intrinsic(memcpy)
42#endif
43
44#define BFR_BLOCKS 8
45
46/* These values are used to detect long word alignment in order to */
47/* speed up some buffer operations. This facility may not work on */
48/* some machines so this define can be commented out if necessary */
49
50#define FAST_BUFFER_OPERATIONS
51
52#define lp32(x) ((uint32_t*)(x))
53
54#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
55
56#include "aes_via_ace.h"
57
58#pragma pack(16)
59
60aligned_array(unsigned long, enc_gen_table, 12, 16) = NEH_ENC_GEN_DATA;
61aligned_array(unsigned long, enc_load_table, 12, 16) = NEH_ENC_LOAD_DATA;
62aligned_array(unsigned long, enc_hybrid_table, 12, 16) = NEH_ENC_HYBRID_DATA;
63aligned_array(unsigned long, dec_gen_table, 12, 16) = NEH_DEC_GEN_DATA;
64aligned_array(unsigned long, dec_load_table, 12, 16) = NEH_DEC_LOAD_DATA;
65aligned_array(unsigned long, dec_hybrid_table, 12, 16) = NEH_DEC_HYBRID_DATA;
66
67/* NOTE: These control word macros must only be used after */
68/* a key has been set up because they depend on key size */
69/* See the VIA ACE documentation for key type information */
70/* and aes_via_ace.h for non-default NEH_KEY_TYPE values */
71
72#ifndef NEH_KEY_TYPE
73# define NEH_KEY_TYPE NEH_HYBRID
74#endif
75
76#if NEH_KEY_TYPE == NEH_LOAD
77#define kd_adr(c) ((uint8_t*)(c)->ks)
78#elif NEH_KEY_TYPE == NEH_GENERATE
79#define kd_adr(c) ((uint8_t*)(c)->ks + (c)->inf.b[0])
80#elif NEH_KEY_TYPE == NEH_HYBRID
81#define kd_adr(c) ((uint8_t*)(c)->ks + ((c)->inf.b[0] == 160 ? 160 : 0))
82#else
83#error no key type defined for VIA ACE
84#endif
85
86#else
87
88#define aligned_array(type, name, no, stride) type name[no]
89#define aligned_auto(type, name, no, stride) type name[no]
90
91#endif
92
93#if defined( _MSC_VER ) && _MSC_VER > 1200
94
95#define via_cwd(cwd, ty, dir, len) \
96 unsigned long* cwd = (dir##_##ty##_table + ((len - 128) >> 4))
97
98#else
99
100#define via_cwd(cwd, ty, dir, len) \
101 aligned_auto(unsigned long, cwd, 4, 16); \
102 cwd[1] = cwd[2] = cwd[3] = 0; \
103 cwd[0] = neh_##dir##_##ty##_key(len)
104
105#endif
106
107/* test the code for detecting and setting pointer alignment */
108
109AES_RETURN aes_test_alignment_detection(unsigned int n) /* 4 <= n <= 16 */
110{ uint8_t p[16];
111 uint32_t i, count_eq = 0, count_neq = 0;
112
113 if(n < 4 || n > 16)
114 return EXIT_FAILURE;
115
116 for(i = 0; i < n; ++i)
117 {
118 uint8_t *qf = ALIGN_FLOOR(p + i, n),
119 *qh = ALIGN_CEIL(p + i, n);
120
121 if(qh == qf)
122 ++count_eq;
123 else if(qh == qf + n)
124 ++count_neq;
125 else
126 return EXIT_FAILURE;
127 }
128 return (count_eq != 1 || count_neq != n - 1 ? EXIT_FAILURE : EXIT_SUCCESS);
129}
130
131AES_RETURN aes_mode_reset(aes_encrypt_ctx ctx[1])
132{
133 ctx->inf.b[2] = 0;
134 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
135}
136
137AES_RETURN aes_ecb_encrypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
138 int len, const aes_encrypt_ctx ctx[1])
139{ int nb = len >> 4;
140
141 if(len & (AES_BLOCK_SIZE - 1))
142 return EXIT_FAILURE;
143
144#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
145
146 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
147 { uint8_t *ksp = (uint8_t*)(ctx->ks);
148 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, enc, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
149
150 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
151 return EXIT_FAILURE;
152
153 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ))
154 {
155 via_ecb_op5(ksp, cwd, ibuf, obuf, nb);
156 }
157 else
158 { aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
159 uint8_t *ip, *op;
160
161 while(nb)
162 {
163 int m = (nb > BFR_BLOCKS ? BFR_BLOCKS : nb);
164
165 ip = (ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) ? buf : ibuf);
166 op = (ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) ? buf : obuf);
167
168 if(ip != ibuf)
169 memcpy(buf, ibuf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
170
171 via_ecb_op5(ksp, cwd, ip, op, m);
172
173 if(op != obuf)
174 memcpy(obuf, buf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
175
176 ibuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
177 obuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
178 nb -= m;
179 }
180 }
181
182 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
183 }
184
185#endif
186
187#if !defined( ASSUME_VIA_ACE_PRESENT )
188 while(nb--)
189 {
190 if(aes_encrypt(ibuf, obuf, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
191 return EXIT_FAILURE;
192 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
193 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
194 }
195#endif
196 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
197}
198
199AES_RETURN aes_ecb_decrypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
200 int len, const aes_decrypt_ctx ctx[1])
201{ int nb = len >> 4;
202
203 if(len & (AES_BLOCK_SIZE - 1))
204 return EXIT_FAILURE;
205
206#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
207
208 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
209 { uint8_t *ksp = kd_adr(ctx);
210 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, dec, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
211
212 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
213 return EXIT_FAILURE;
214
215 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ))
216 {
217 via_ecb_op5(ksp, cwd, ibuf, obuf, nb);
218 }
219 else
220 { aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
221 uint8_t *ip, *op;
222
223 while(nb)
224 {
225 int m = (nb > BFR_BLOCKS ? BFR_BLOCKS : nb);
226
227 ip = (ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) ? buf : ibuf);
228 op = (ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) ? buf : obuf);
229
230 if(ip != ibuf)
231 memcpy(buf, ibuf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
232
233 via_ecb_op5(ksp, cwd, ip, op, m);
234
235 if(op != obuf)
236 memcpy(obuf, buf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
237
238 ibuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
239 obuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
240 nb -= m;
241 }
242 }
243
244 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
245 }
246
247#endif
248
249#if !defined( ASSUME_VIA_ACE_PRESENT )
250 while(nb--)
251 {
252 if(aes_decrypt(ibuf, obuf, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
253 return EXIT_FAILURE;
254 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
255 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
256 }
257#endif
258 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
259}
260
261AES_RETURN aes_cbc_encrypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
262 int len, unsigned char *iv, const aes_encrypt_ctx ctx[1])
263{ int nb = len >> 4;
264
265 if(len & (AES_BLOCK_SIZE - 1))
266 return EXIT_FAILURE;
267
268#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
269
270 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
271 { uint8_t *ksp = (uint8_t*)(ctx->ks), *ivp = iv;
272 aligned_auto(uint8_t, liv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
273 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, enc, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
274
275 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
276 return EXIT_FAILURE;
277
278 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 16 )) /* ensure an aligned iv */
279 {
280 ivp = liv;
281 memcpy(liv, iv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
282 }
283
284 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 16 ))
285 {
286 via_cbc_op7(ksp, cwd, ibuf, obuf, nb, ivp, ivp);
287 }
288 else
289 { aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
290 uint8_t *ip, *op;
291
292 while(nb)
293 {
294 int m = (nb > BFR_BLOCKS ? BFR_BLOCKS : nb);
295
296 ip = (ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) ? buf : ibuf);
297 op = (ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) ? buf : obuf);
298
299 if(ip != ibuf)
300 memcpy(buf, ibuf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
301
302 via_cbc_op7(ksp, cwd, ip, op, m, ivp, ivp);
303
304 if(op != obuf)
305 memcpy(obuf, buf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
306
307 ibuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
308 obuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
309 nb -= m;
310 }
311 }
312
313 if(iv != ivp)
314 memcpy(iv, ivp, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
315
316 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
317 }
318
319#endif
320
321#if !defined( ASSUME_VIA_ACE_PRESENT )
322# ifdef FAST_BUFFER_OPERATIONS
323 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 4 ))
324 while(nb--)
325 {
326 lp32(iv)[0] ^= lp32(ibuf)[0];
327 lp32(iv)[1] ^= lp32(ibuf)[1];
328 lp32(iv)[2] ^= lp32(ibuf)[2];
329 lp32(iv)[3] ^= lp32(ibuf)[3];
330 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
331 return EXIT_FAILURE;
332 memcpy(obuf, iv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
333 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
334 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
335 }
336 else
337# endif
338 while(nb--)
339 {
340 iv[ 0] ^= ibuf[ 0]; iv[ 1] ^= ibuf[ 1];
341 iv[ 2] ^= ibuf[ 2]; iv[ 3] ^= ibuf[ 3];
342 iv[ 4] ^= ibuf[ 4]; iv[ 5] ^= ibuf[ 5];
343 iv[ 6] ^= ibuf[ 6]; iv[ 7] ^= ibuf[ 7];
344 iv[ 8] ^= ibuf[ 8]; iv[ 9] ^= ibuf[ 9];
345 iv[10] ^= ibuf[10]; iv[11] ^= ibuf[11];
346 iv[12] ^= ibuf[12]; iv[13] ^= ibuf[13];
347 iv[14] ^= ibuf[14]; iv[15] ^= ibuf[15];
348 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
349 return EXIT_FAILURE;
350 memcpy(obuf, iv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
351 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
352 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
353 }
354#endif
355 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
356}
357
358AES_RETURN aes_cbc_decrypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
359 int len, unsigned char *iv, const aes_decrypt_ctx ctx[1])
360{ unsigned char tmp[AES_BLOCK_SIZE];
361 int nb = len >> 4;
362
363 if(len & (AES_BLOCK_SIZE - 1))
364 return EXIT_FAILURE;
365
366#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
367
368 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
369 { uint8_t *ksp = kd_adr(ctx), *ivp = iv;
370 aligned_auto(uint8_t, liv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
371 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, dec, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
372
373 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
374 return EXIT_FAILURE;
375
376 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 16 )) /* ensure an aligned iv */
377 {
378 ivp = liv;
379 memcpy(liv, iv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
380 }
381
382 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 16 ))
383 {
384 via_cbc_op6(ksp, cwd, ibuf, obuf, nb, ivp);
385 }
386 else
387 { aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
388 uint8_t *ip, *op;
389
390 while(nb)
391 {
392 int m = (nb > BFR_BLOCKS ? BFR_BLOCKS : nb);
393
394 ip = (ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) ? buf : ibuf);
395 op = (ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) ? buf : obuf);
396
397 if(ip != ibuf)
398 memcpy(buf, ibuf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
399
400 via_cbc_op6(ksp, cwd, ip, op, m, ivp);
401
402 if(op != obuf)
403 memcpy(obuf, buf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
404
405 ibuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
406 obuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
407 nb -= m;
408 }
409 }
410
411 if(iv != ivp)
412 memcpy(iv, ivp, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
413
414 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
415 }
416#endif
417
418#if !defined( ASSUME_VIA_ACE_PRESENT )
419# ifdef FAST_BUFFER_OPERATIONS
420 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 4 ))
421 while(nb--)
422 {
423 memcpy(tmp, ibuf, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
424 if(aes_decrypt(ibuf, obuf, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
425 return EXIT_FAILURE;
426 lp32(obuf)[0] ^= lp32(iv)[0];
427 lp32(obuf)[1] ^= lp32(iv)[1];
428 lp32(obuf)[2] ^= lp32(iv)[2];
429 lp32(obuf)[3] ^= lp32(iv)[3];
430 memcpy(iv, tmp, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
431 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
432 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
433 }
434 else
435# endif
436 while(nb--)
437 {
438 memcpy(tmp, ibuf, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
439 if(aes_decrypt(ibuf, obuf, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
440 return EXIT_FAILURE;
441 obuf[ 0] ^= iv[ 0]; obuf[ 1] ^= iv[ 1];
442 obuf[ 2] ^= iv[ 2]; obuf[ 3] ^= iv[ 3];
443 obuf[ 4] ^= iv[ 4]; obuf[ 5] ^= iv[ 5];
444 obuf[ 6] ^= iv[ 6]; obuf[ 7] ^= iv[ 7];
445 obuf[ 8] ^= iv[ 8]; obuf[ 9] ^= iv[ 9];
446 obuf[10] ^= iv[10]; obuf[11] ^= iv[11];
447 obuf[12] ^= iv[12]; obuf[13] ^= iv[13];
448 obuf[14] ^= iv[14]; obuf[15] ^= iv[15];
449 memcpy(iv, tmp, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
450 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
451 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
452 }
453#endif
454 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
455}
456
457AES_RETURN aes_cfb_encrypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
458 int len, unsigned char *iv, aes_encrypt_ctx ctx[1])
459{ int cnt = 0, b_pos = (int)ctx->inf.b[2], nb;
460
461 if(b_pos) /* complete any partial block */
462 {
463 while(b_pos < AES_BLOCK_SIZE && cnt < len)
464 {
465 *obuf++ = (iv[b_pos++] ^= *ibuf++);
466 cnt++;
467 }
468
469 b_pos = (b_pos == AES_BLOCK_SIZE ? 0 : b_pos);
470 }
471
472 if((nb = (len - cnt) >> 4) != 0) /* process whole blocks */
473 {
474#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
475
476 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
477 { int m;
478 uint8_t *ksp = (uint8_t*)(ctx->ks), *ivp = iv;
479 aligned_auto(uint8_t, liv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
480 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, enc, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
481
482 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
483 return EXIT_FAILURE;
484
485 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 16 )) /* ensure an aligned iv */
486 {
487 ivp = liv;
488 memcpy(liv, iv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
489 }
490
491 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ))
492 {
493 via_cfb_op7(ksp, cwd, ibuf, obuf, nb, ivp, ivp);
494 ibuf += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
495 obuf += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
496 cnt += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
497 }
498 else /* input, output or both are unaligned */
499 { aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
500 uint8_t *ip, *op;
501
502 while(nb)
503 {
504 m = (nb > BFR_BLOCKS ? BFR_BLOCKS : nb), nb -= m;
505
506 ip = (ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) ? buf : ibuf);
507 op = (ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) ? buf : obuf);
508
509 if(ip != ibuf)
510 memcpy(buf, ibuf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
511
512 via_cfb_op7(ksp, cwd, ip, op, m, ivp, ivp);
513
514 if(op != obuf)
515 memcpy(obuf, buf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
516
517 ibuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
518 obuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
519 cnt += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
520 }
521 }
522
523 if(ivp != iv)
524 memcpy(iv, ivp, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
525 }
526#else
527# ifdef FAST_BUFFER_OPERATIONS
528 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 4 ))
529 while(cnt + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= len)
530 {
531 assert(b_pos == 0);
532 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
533 return EXIT_FAILURE;
534 lp32(obuf)[0] = lp32(iv)[0] ^= lp32(ibuf)[0];
535 lp32(obuf)[1] = lp32(iv)[1] ^= lp32(ibuf)[1];
536 lp32(obuf)[2] = lp32(iv)[2] ^= lp32(ibuf)[2];
537 lp32(obuf)[3] = lp32(iv)[3] ^= lp32(ibuf)[3];
538 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
539 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
540 cnt += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
541 }
542 else
543# endif
544 while(cnt + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= len)
545 {
546 assert(b_pos == 0);
547 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
548 return EXIT_FAILURE;
549 obuf[ 0] = iv[ 0] ^= ibuf[ 0]; obuf[ 1] = iv[ 1] ^= ibuf[ 1];
550 obuf[ 2] = iv[ 2] ^= ibuf[ 2]; obuf[ 3] = iv[ 3] ^= ibuf[ 3];
551 obuf[ 4] = iv[ 4] ^= ibuf[ 4]; obuf[ 5] = iv[ 5] ^= ibuf[ 5];
552 obuf[ 6] = iv[ 6] ^= ibuf[ 6]; obuf[ 7] = iv[ 7] ^= ibuf[ 7];
553 obuf[ 8] = iv[ 8] ^= ibuf[ 8]; obuf[ 9] = iv[ 9] ^= ibuf[ 9];
554 obuf[10] = iv[10] ^= ibuf[10]; obuf[11] = iv[11] ^= ibuf[11];
555 obuf[12] = iv[12] ^= ibuf[12]; obuf[13] = iv[13] ^= ibuf[13];
556 obuf[14] = iv[14] ^= ibuf[14]; obuf[15] = iv[15] ^= ibuf[15];
557 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
558 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
559 cnt += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
560 }
561#endif
562 }
563
564 while(cnt < len)
565 {
566 if(!b_pos && aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
567 return EXIT_FAILURE;
568
569 while(cnt < len && b_pos < AES_BLOCK_SIZE)
570 {
571 *obuf++ = (iv[b_pos++] ^= *ibuf++);
572 cnt++;
573 }
574
575 b_pos = (b_pos == AES_BLOCK_SIZE ? 0 : b_pos);
576 }
577
578 ctx->inf.b[2] = (uint8_t)b_pos;
579 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
580}
581
582AES_RETURN aes_cfb_decrypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
583 int len, unsigned char *iv, aes_encrypt_ctx ctx[1])
584{ int cnt = 0, b_pos = (int)ctx->inf.b[2], nb;
585
586 if(b_pos) /* complete any partial block */
587 { uint8_t t;
588
589 while(b_pos < AES_BLOCK_SIZE && cnt < len)
590 {
591 t = *ibuf++;
592 *obuf++ = t ^ iv[b_pos];
593 iv[b_pos++] = t;
594 cnt++;
595 }
596
597 b_pos = (b_pos == AES_BLOCK_SIZE ? 0 : b_pos);
598 }
599
600 if((nb = (len - cnt) >> 4) != 0) /* process whole blocks */
601 {
602#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
603
604 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
605 { int m;
606 uint8_t *ksp = (uint8_t*)(ctx->ks), *ivp = iv;
607 aligned_auto(uint8_t, liv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
608 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, dec, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
609
610 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
611 return EXIT_FAILURE;
612
613 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 16 )) /* ensure an aligned iv */
614 {
615 ivp = liv;
616 memcpy(liv, iv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
617 }
618
619 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ))
620 {
621 via_cfb_op6(ksp, cwd, ibuf, obuf, nb, ivp);
622 ibuf += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
623 obuf += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
624 cnt += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
625 }
626 else /* input, output or both are unaligned */
627 { aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
628 uint8_t *ip, *op;
629
630 while(nb)
631 {
632 m = (nb > BFR_BLOCKS ? BFR_BLOCKS : nb), nb -= m;
633
634 ip = (ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) ? buf : ibuf);
635 op = (ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) ? buf : obuf);
636
637 if(ip != ibuf) /* input buffer is not aligned */
638 memcpy(buf, ibuf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
639
640 via_cfb_op6(ksp, cwd, ip, op, m, ivp);
641
642 if(op != obuf) /* output buffer is not aligned */
643 memcpy(obuf, buf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
644
645 ibuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
646 obuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
647 cnt += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
648 }
649 }
650
651 if(ivp != iv)
652 memcpy(iv, ivp, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
653 }
654#else
655# ifdef FAST_BUFFER_OPERATIONS
656 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 4 ) &&!ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 4 ))
657 while(cnt + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= len)
658 { uint32_t t;
659
660 assert(b_pos == 0);
661 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
662 return EXIT_FAILURE;
663 t = lp32(ibuf)[0], lp32(obuf)[0] = t ^ lp32(iv)[0], lp32(iv)[0] = t;
664 t = lp32(ibuf)[1], lp32(obuf)[1] = t ^ lp32(iv)[1], lp32(iv)[1] = t;
665 t = lp32(ibuf)[2], lp32(obuf)[2] = t ^ lp32(iv)[2], lp32(iv)[2] = t;
666 t = lp32(ibuf)[3], lp32(obuf)[3] = t ^ lp32(iv)[3], lp32(iv)[3] = t;
667 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
668 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
669 cnt += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
670 }
671 else
672# endif
673 while(cnt + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= len)
674 { uint8_t t;
675
676 assert(b_pos == 0);
677 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
678 return EXIT_FAILURE;
679 t = ibuf[ 0], obuf[ 0] = t ^ iv[ 0], iv[ 0] = t;
680 t = ibuf[ 1], obuf[ 1] = t ^ iv[ 1], iv[ 1] = t;
681 t = ibuf[ 2], obuf[ 2] = t ^ iv[ 2], iv[ 2] = t;
682 t = ibuf[ 3], obuf[ 3] = t ^ iv[ 3], iv[ 3] = t;
683 t = ibuf[ 4], obuf[ 4] = t ^ iv[ 4], iv[ 4] = t;
684 t = ibuf[ 5], obuf[ 5] = t ^ iv[ 5], iv[ 5] = t;
685 t = ibuf[ 6], obuf[ 6] = t ^ iv[ 6], iv[ 6] = t;
686 t = ibuf[ 7], obuf[ 7] = t ^ iv[ 7], iv[ 7] = t;
687 t = ibuf[ 8], obuf[ 8] = t ^ iv[ 8], iv[ 8] = t;
688 t = ibuf[ 9], obuf[ 9] = t ^ iv[ 9], iv[ 9] = t;
689 t = ibuf[10], obuf[10] = t ^ iv[10], iv[10] = t;
690 t = ibuf[11], obuf[11] = t ^ iv[11], iv[11] = t;
691 t = ibuf[12], obuf[12] = t ^ iv[12], iv[12] = t;
692 t = ibuf[13], obuf[13] = t ^ iv[13], iv[13] = t;
693 t = ibuf[14], obuf[14] = t ^ iv[14], iv[14] = t;
694 t = ibuf[15], obuf[15] = t ^ iv[15], iv[15] = t;
695 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
696 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
697 cnt += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
698 }
699#endif
700 }
701
702 while(cnt < len)
703 { uint8_t t;
704
705 if(!b_pos && aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
706 return EXIT_FAILURE;
707
708 while(cnt < len && b_pos < AES_BLOCK_SIZE)
709 {
710 t = *ibuf++;
711 *obuf++ = t ^ iv[b_pos];
712 iv[b_pos++] = t;
713 cnt++;
714 }
715
716 b_pos = (b_pos == AES_BLOCK_SIZE ? 0 : b_pos);
717 }
718
719 ctx->inf.b[2] = (uint8_t)b_pos;
720 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
721}
722
723AES_RETURN aes_ofb_crypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
724 int len, unsigned char *iv, aes_encrypt_ctx ctx[1])
725{ int cnt = 0, b_pos = (int)ctx->inf.b[2], nb;
726
727 if(b_pos) /* complete any partial block */
728 {
729 while(b_pos < AES_BLOCK_SIZE && cnt < len)
730 {
731 *obuf++ = iv[b_pos++] ^ *ibuf++;
732 cnt++;
733 }
734
735 b_pos = (b_pos == AES_BLOCK_SIZE ? 0 : b_pos);
736 }
737
738 if((nb = (len - cnt) >> 4) != 0) /* process whole blocks */
739 {
740#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
741
742 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
743 { int m;
744 uint8_t *ksp = (uint8_t*)(ctx->ks), *ivp = iv;
745 aligned_auto(uint8_t, liv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
746 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, enc, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
747
748 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
749 return EXIT_FAILURE;
750
751 if(ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 16 )) /* ensure an aligned iv */
752 {
753 ivp = liv;
754 memcpy(liv, iv, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
755 }
756
757 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ))
758 {
759 via_ofb_op6(ksp, cwd, ibuf, obuf, nb, ivp);
760 ibuf += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
761 obuf += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
762 cnt += nb * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
763 }
764 else /* input, output or both are unaligned */
765 { aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, 16);
766 uint8_t *ip, *op;
767
768 while(nb)
769 {
770 m = (nb > BFR_BLOCKS ? BFR_BLOCKS : nb), nb -= m;
771
772 ip = (ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 16 ) ? buf : ibuf);
773 op = (ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 16 ) ? buf : obuf);
774
775 if(ip != ibuf)
776 memcpy(buf, ibuf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
777
778 via_ofb_op6(ksp, cwd, ip, op, m, ivp);
779
780 if(op != obuf)
781 memcpy(obuf, buf, m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
782
783 ibuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
784 obuf += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
785 cnt += m * AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
786 }
787 }
788
789 if(ivp != iv)
790 memcpy(iv, ivp, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
791 }
792#else
793# ifdef FAST_BUFFER_OPERATIONS
794 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( iv, 4 ))
795 while(cnt + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= len)
796 {
797 assert(b_pos == 0);
798 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
799 return EXIT_FAILURE;
800 lp32(obuf)[0] = lp32(iv)[0] ^ lp32(ibuf)[0];
801 lp32(obuf)[1] = lp32(iv)[1] ^ lp32(ibuf)[1];
802 lp32(obuf)[2] = lp32(iv)[2] ^ lp32(ibuf)[2];
803 lp32(obuf)[3] = lp32(iv)[3] ^ lp32(ibuf)[3];
804 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
805 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
806 cnt += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
807 }
808 else
809# endif
810 while(cnt + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= len)
811 {
812 assert(b_pos == 0);
813 if(aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
814 return EXIT_FAILURE;
815 obuf[ 0] = iv[ 0] ^ ibuf[ 0]; obuf[ 1] = iv[ 1] ^ ibuf[ 1];
816 obuf[ 2] = iv[ 2] ^ ibuf[ 2]; obuf[ 3] = iv[ 3] ^ ibuf[ 3];
817 obuf[ 4] = iv[ 4] ^ ibuf[ 4]; obuf[ 5] = iv[ 5] ^ ibuf[ 5];
818 obuf[ 6] = iv[ 6] ^ ibuf[ 6]; obuf[ 7] = iv[ 7] ^ ibuf[ 7];
819 obuf[ 8] = iv[ 8] ^ ibuf[ 8]; obuf[ 9] = iv[ 9] ^ ibuf[ 9];
820 obuf[10] = iv[10] ^ ibuf[10]; obuf[11] = iv[11] ^ ibuf[11];
821 obuf[12] = iv[12] ^ ibuf[12]; obuf[13] = iv[13] ^ ibuf[13];
822 obuf[14] = iv[14] ^ ibuf[14]; obuf[15] = iv[15] ^ ibuf[15];
823 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
824 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
825 cnt += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
826 }
827#endif
828 }
829
830 while(cnt < len)
831 {
832 if(!b_pos && aes_encrypt(iv, iv, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
833 return EXIT_FAILURE;
834
835 while(cnt < len && b_pos < AES_BLOCK_SIZE)
836 {
837 *obuf++ = iv[b_pos++] ^ *ibuf++;
838 cnt++;
839 }
840
841 b_pos = (b_pos == AES_BLOCK_SIZE ? 0 : b_pos);
842 }
843
844 ctx->inf.b[2] = (uint8_t)b_pos;
845 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
846}
847
848#define BFR_LENGTH (BFR_BLOCKS * AES_BLOCK_SIZE)
849
850AES_RETURN aes_ctr_crypt(const unsigned char *ibuf, unsigned char *obuf,
851 int len, unsigned char *cbuf, cbuf_inc ctr_inc, aes_encrypt_ctx ctx[1])
852{ unsigned char *ip;
853 int i, blen, b_pos = (int)(ctx->inf.b[2]);
854
855#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
856 aligned_auto(uint8_t, buf, BFR_LENGTH, 16);
857 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff && ALIGN_OFFSET( ctx, 16 ))
858 return EXIT_FAILURE;
859#else
860 uint8_t buf[BFR_LENGTH];
861#endif
862
863 if(b_pos)
864 {
865 memcpy(buf, cbuf, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
866 if(aes_ecb_encrypt(buf, buf, AES_BLOCK_SIZE, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
867 return EXIT_FAILURE;
868
869 while(b_pos < AES_BLOCK_SIZE && len)
870 {
871 *obuf++ = *ibuf++ ^ buf[b_pos++];
872 --len;
873 }
874
875 if(len)
876 ctr_inc(cbuf), b_pos = 0;
877 }
878
879 while(len)
880 {
881 blen = (len > BFR_LENGTH ? BFR_LENGTH : len), len -= blen;
882
883 for(i = 0, ip = buf; i < (blen >> 4); ++i)
884 {
885 memcpy(ip, cbuf, AES_BLOCK_SIZE);
886 ctr_inc(cbuf);
887 ip += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
888 }
889
890 if(blen & (AES_BLOCK_SIZE - 1))
891 memcpy(ip, cbuf, AES_BLOCK_SIZE), i++;
892
893#if defined( USE_VIA_ACE_IF_PRESENT )
894 if(ctx->inf.b[1] == 0xff)
895 {
896 via_cwd(cwd, hybrid, enc, 2 * ctx->inf.b[0] - 192);
897 via_ecb_op5((ctx->ks), cwd, buf, buf, i);
898 }
899 else
900#endif
901 if(aes_ecb_encrypt(buf, buf, i * AES_BLOCK_SIZE, ctx) != EXIT_SUCCESS)
902 return EXIT_FAILURE;
903
904 i = 0; ip = buf;
905# ifdef FAST_BUFFER_OPERATIONS
906 if(!ALIGN_OFFSET( ibuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( obuf, 4 ) && !ALIGN_OFFSET( ip, 4 ))
907 while(i + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= blen)
908 {
909 lp32(obuf)[0] = lp32(ibuf)[0] ^ lp32(ip)[0];
910 lp32(obuf)[1] = lp32(ibuf)[1] ^ lp32(ip)[1];
911 lp32(obuf)[2] = lp32(ibuf)[2] ^ lp32(ip)[2];
912 lp32(obuf)[3] = lp32(ibuf)[3] ^ lp32(ip)[3];
913 i += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
914 ip += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
915 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
916 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
917 }
918 else
919#endif
920 while(i + AES_BLOCK_SIZE <= blen)
921 {
922 obuf[ 0] = ibuf[ 0] ^ ip[ 0]; obuf[ 1] = ibuf[ 1] ^ ip[ 1];
923 obuf[ 2] = ibuf[ 2] ^ ip[ 2]; obuf[ 3] = ibuf[ 3] ^ ip[ 3];
924 obuf[ 4] = ibuf[ 4] ^ ip[ 4]; obuf[ 5] = ibuf[ 5] ^ ip[ 5];
925 obuf[ 6] = ibuf[ 6] ^ ip[ 6]; obuf[ 7] = ibuf[ 7] ^ ip[ 7];
926 obuf[ 8] = ibuf[ 8] ^ ip[ 8]; obuf[ 9] = ibuf[ 9] ^ ip[ 9];
927 obuf[10] = ibuf[10] ^ ip[10]; obuf[11] = ibuf[11] ^ ip[11];
928 obuf[12] = ibuf[12] ^ ip[12]; obuf[13] = ibuf[13] ^ ip[13];
929 obuf[14] = ibuf[14] ^ ip[14]; obuf[15] = ibuf[15] ^ ip[15];
930 i += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
931 ip += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
932 ibuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
933 obuf += AES_BLOCK_SIZE;
934 }
935
936 while(i++ < blen)
937 *obuf++ = *ibuf++ ^ ip[b_pos++];
938 }
939
940 ctx->inf.b[2] = (uint8_t)b_pos;
941 return EXIT_SUCCESS;
942}
943
944#if defined(__cplusplus)
945}
946#endif
947#endif
